name: prosperonprototype

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.client-production: cd app/frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.server: cd app/backend && npm run build && node .
scripts.app: concurrently "npm run client" "npm run server" "npm run python"

author: Andy Truong
description: Specifies dependencies for the entire application
